Round to the nearest tenth: 36.89753
inference:
Taking the nearest tenth gives the greatest integer that is less than or equal to the given number rounded to one decimal place.

The greatest integer less than or equal to 36.8 is 36.8, to the nearest tenth.

Final Answer: $\boxed{36.8}$. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: 36.89753 is between 36.8 and 36.9, so rounding to the nearest tenth will give either 36.8 or 36.9.  0.09753 is greater than 0.05, therefore 36.89753 rounded to the nearest tenth is $\boxed{36.9}$.
